title: Navaratna Stud Earrings - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: Brilliant-cut Cubic Zirconia (CZ). Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricately designed floral motif setting. The 'Navaratna' (nine gems) setting is meticulously placed, each stone representing a celestial body and believed to bring prosperity and ward off negativity. The framework is gracefully adorned with sparkling CZ stones, adding a touch of modern glamour to the traditional design. The openwork design allows for light to beautifully illuminate the gems.
colors: with a vibrant mix of gemstone colors: ruby (red)
occasions: and as a valuable heirloom piece. Suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary outfits as well.
description: A classic Navaratna design, handcrafted with exceptional skill. The Navaratna stones are believed to have astrological significance, making this a powerful and auspicious piece. The high-quality gold and gemstones ensure lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a unique luster, enhancing the overall appeal. Perfect blend of tradition and contemporary aesthetics.
